title: Whole cell vaccines for typhoid are more effective but more toxic than newer vaccines
description: Typhoid fever remains endemic in much of the developing world. Large field trials have provided different estimates of the efficacy of vaccines. Engels et al (p [110][1]) performed a meta-analysis to assess the efficacy and toxicity of these vaccines. They found that the whole cell vaccines were
